title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing red clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing red clothes in a dream in detail, as red is considered one of the most attractive colors, as it arouses attention and attracts attention, and it is one of the fiery colors that symbolizes feelings and love. The dream has many connotations and meanings that we will learn about today in our article. We also discover the most important details of the red clothes in the dream, which differ from one person to another, so we will give you an interpretation of the dream of seeing. Red clothes in a dream for a single, pregnant, married man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing red clothes by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about seeing red clothes, especially in a woman’s dream, is evidence of effort and progress towards achieving her goals and aspirations. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing this red dress is a sign that she She will get married soon. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for single women: In general, the color red in an unmarried girl’s clothes carries a sign indicating her brilliance and distinction, as it is a symbol of positive energy. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a red dress in a dream means that she is going through an intense emotional state in reality. Also The red coat in a dream indicates warm feelings, especially if this coat is made of wool. Also, red clothes in a dream for unmarried women is evidence that they will become innovative and have a lot of creativity in their studies and sciences, and it also symbolizes their sharp intelligence and great ambition. It indicates The red dress for a single woman in a dream indicates that she has soft powers that affect those around her in a strange way, which is a moral force such as attraction and charm. Seeing red clothes in a dream for a single girl is evidence that she likes to keep up with fashion and always looks good. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a married womanThe color indicates Red for a married woman indicates good luck, abundance of money, livelihood, and kindness. As for seeing a woman in red clothes, this is evidence of the extent of harmony and love between her and her husband. For a married woman who sees herself wearing a short red dress, this dream is hateful to her because it actually indicates disagreements and problems between the family. And relatives. Seeing a red coat, pants, shirt, socks, and shoes in a dream means that there is a lot of food and money for them. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a pregnant woman. Seeing red clothes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates abundance of wealth and goodness. Seeing a sick pregnant woman in a red dress in a dream is evidence On the death of this disease, fatigue, recovery, and enjoyment of health. Also, seeing a red dress indicates the birth of a baby girl in reality, as the red color is a sign of femininity. Interpretation of a dream about red clothes for a man: If you see a red coat in a man’s dream, this means that he suffers from many problems and fears. As for seeing Red pants in a dream indicate the amount of time and money that is wasted on trivial things. Likewise, seeing a red shirt in a dream indicates a lot of fun and games carried out by the fortuneteller and wasting money on things that God has forbidden. The red dress in a man’s dream is evidence of many things. a

title: Interpretation of a dream about olives in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream, which suggests different meanings depending on the vision, such as dreaming of an olive branch, dreaming of planting an olive tree, and eating green olives for a pregnant woman. You may also be interested in meeting the girl in a dream. We will try to provide an explanation of the various expressions of these visions by various interpretation scholars, the most famous of whom are in the world Islamic, while emphasizing that what we present on our website is nothing but simple information through which the dreamer learns the main meaning of these visions without casting any interpretation that we offer on any dream the reader has seen, with the advice that if searching for an interpretation, it is best to consult a Sharia interpreter who can deal with it. The dream is scientifically studied in order to give the appropriate interpretation to it. Interpretation of a dream about olives by Sheikh Nabulsi. Olives in a poor man’s dream are food and money that belong to him and money is his. In a sick man’s dream, there is good news of a speedy recovery, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about olives by Sheikh Nabulsi. Olives in a poor man’s dream are food and money that he has and money that He has, and I am in the patient’s dream good news of recovery. Interpretation of an olive tree in a dream. The presence of swallowing olive fruits in a dream indicates the greed that exists in a person. Interpretation of seeing olives in a dreamInterpretation of seeing olives in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing olives in a dream varies according to the appearance of the olive When eating green olives, this indicates the dreamer’s inability to engage in good things. Just like black olives in a dream and the dreamer picks them, this may indicate opening a source of livelihood for the dreamer - God willing -. As for yellow olives in a dream for a sick person, this indicates the necessity of Return to God Almighty. As for the person who dreams that he is dripping olives, this indicates the worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from. See also: The project in a dream. Seeing olive trees in a dream. When you dream of olives in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer is one of the blessed and beneficial personalities for his people. Olives in general symbolize To knowledge and blessing, and God knows best. Just like planting olive trees in a dream, this heralds the imminent achievement of the goals that the dreamer seeks. Dreaming that you are climbing an olive tree in a dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a series of problems in the coming period, God forbid. As for the dreamer A person who does not work and sees in a dream that he is climbing an olive tree, this indicates the presence of a relative of his who will help him - God willing -. See also: Symbols that indicate problems. A dream about picking and harvesting olives. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is picking olives from a tree, this foretells the approaching date. Marriage - God willing - As for the pregnant woman who collects olives in a dream, this foretells her of the imminent date of birth - God willing - and the safety of the fetus. Just like a pregnant woman who sees herself standing under an olive tree in a dream, this may be good news for her that she will give birth to a boy. And God knows best. As for a married woman who picks olives in a dream, this may be good news that she will become pregnant soon - if

title: Interpretation of a dream about wine in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wine in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine in a dream on the Moments website. Interpretation of a dream about wine in a dream. And whoever sees: Whoever drinks wine and drinks from it, then money is forbidden from him. From that power you gain power and drunkenness becomes power and wealth, even if it is from drink. And drunkenness Without drinking, it is a dangerous phobia, and drunkenness is harmful to both men and women because it indicates a lot of ignorance. Drunkenness is the best evidence for someone who is afraid, and drunkenness without drunkenness indicates the claim that he is incapable, and that he is incapable. Perhaps some calamity will befall him and he will return from it drunk. If he is a man Righteous, for he is intoxicated by the love of God Almighty. Seeing wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. As for Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of drinking wine: The basic principle is that money is forbidden without effort, so whoever is seen drinking wine, then he will commit a great sin, and a great sin, according to the Almighty’s words. (They ask you about wine and gambling. So say, “There is a great sin in them and a benefit to people, and their sin is greater than their benefit.” And whoever dreams that he did not drink it, whoever argues with him about that, the forbidden money will affect him. And they said, “It is possible that it is legal money. If he is drinking and there is someone arguing with him about this topic, he will argue with him equally.” And whoever sees that he is drinking it in his cup, there is no dispute over it, then he is struck with prohibited money, and it was said: It is permissible money. If that is the case, then it is disputed in speech and in court. Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine by Ibn Shaheen: Whoever sees that He drank wine and there was no one to ask him about it, then he is affected by the forbidden money as long as he drank it. It was said that it is a great sin, according to the Almighty’s words: (They ask you about wine and gambling, so say that there is a great sin among them). And whoever dreams that he drinks wine and drinks from it, the forbidden money will affect him. Interpretation of a dream about wine. For unmarried women: I am a single girl and I dreamed that I was drinking alcohol. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream that I am drinking alcohol in a dream? It is noteworthy that an unmarried woman who sees or drinks alcohol has many suggestions in her life that express her reality. Seeing alcohol in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of... She will attain goodness and blessings in her life. As for the interpretation of an unmarried woman drinking alcohol in a dream, it indicates that he will marry her soon. Seeing unmarried women drinking alcohol in a dream, and having fun while drinking, is evidence of the marital happiness that you will experience with your life partner in the future. As for seeing An unmarried fiancée drinking alcohol indicates that her marriage contract was valid. Also, seeing an unmarried woman drinking alcohol and having someone propose to her but not expressing her opinion, this dream is evidence of her approval of this man. As for seeing drunkenness in an unmarried girl’s dream, this is a vision Unpleasant for her indicates how weak she is. Interpretation of a dream about wine for a married woman: I dreamed that I drank wine and drank in a dream, what does this mean? For a married woman to see or drink alcohol in her dream carries many implications.

title: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman, Ibn Sirin

preview.html: We present the interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. In different cases, a car in a dream is one of the most mysterious dreams that can come to us in a dream. Some dream of buying it, riding it or driving it, others see it in different colors. In all cases, the viewer does not know whether this dream shows kindness symbolizing something he hates, but this vision has many different interpretations depending on the situation in which you can see it. Encyclopedia, where we review what Imam Ibn Shirin said in interpreting the dream of a car. Interpretation of seeing a car in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a car in a dream in general as a sign of the great status that the owner of the vision enjoys in reality. If a man sees in a dream that he is driving a car, then this vision indicates that he is being betrayed in reality and he must be careful. Seeing driving a car Fast indicates that the dreamer is a reckless and impulsive person who does not hesitate to make his decisions. One of the symbols of driving a car in a dream is that it indicates that the dreamer is competing with others at work, and God knows best. This vision may indicate the extent of the dreamer’s control over all the affairs of his life. Seeing a car breaking down in a dream means that the dreamer will face many problems in his life. Driving a car in a dream indicates that the dreamer will go through many difficult circumstances. If one sees in his dream that he is riding A car and driving on a road he knows, this vision portends goodness, and he will obtain a lot of money, and God knows best. Seeing yourself selling a car in a dream is one of the hateful dreams that may indicate that the dreamer will lose his place among people. The car in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a car in general in A person’s dream indicates the extent of his success and ambition in reality. Among the symbols of a single woman dreaming of a car is that it indicates the approaching date of marriage, and God knows best, and it could symbolize a family meeting. Seeing a green car in a dream shows the good morals of the dreamer. If an unmarried woman sees it in Her dream is that she is driving a car, then this vision indicates happiness and goodness for her. If you see a black car in a dream for an unmarried woman, this means that her condition will change for the better, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a car in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, seeing a car in her dream indicates improvement. Her financial situation, especially if she sees the new car. If a married woman sees the body of a car, this dream symbolizes the strength of the personality of the dreamer. If a married woman sees that she is driving a car with her husband, this dream shows the strength of her relationship with her husband and the stability of their marital life. It is a symbol of Seeing a car in a dream indicates the ease of one’s circumstances on the ground. Seeing an old car or a car accident for a married woman indicates that she will face many problems in reality. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant car in a dream in general means goodness and hearing happy news. In reality, and God knows best. One of the symbols of seeing a car in a pregnant woman’s dream is that she will give birth to a male child, and God is Most High

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a camel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a camel in a dream, a dream about a camel has many indicators and symbols that differ between good and evil. The dream, seeing a camel in a dream, a pregnant camel in a dream, buying a camel, eating camel meat in a dream, the death of a camel, a white camel in a dream, dreaming about hearing the sound of a camel, dreaming about a beautiful camel, dreaming about a sick camel. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a camel by Ibn Sirin. A dream about a camel that chases me Ibn Sirin in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a very patient person. Seeing and hearing the sound of a camel, which was strange and loud in the dream, is evidence of the dreamer’s death or being exposed to a serious illness. Seeing a camel by Ibn Sirin in a dream indicates that this dreamer will endure many problems and difficulties in life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a camel about Nablus: Seeing a camel in a dream while storing water in its stomach indicates the need to review decisions that were made before. A camel storing water in a dream means salvation from all the sorrows and difficulties that the dreamer overcomes. The dream of talking to a camel in a dream Evidence of seeking advice and obtaining someone’s opinion on life matters. Seeing camels in a dream is evidence of achieving goals and earning a lot of money. A person’s dream that he has turned into a camel in a dream indicates that the dreamer bears responsibility. Interpretation of a dream of a camel for a single woman: Seeing camels for an unmarried girl in The dream is evidence of her marriage to a young man who has rights and God takes care of her. A dream about a girl riding a camel indicates that she will marry a good man in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about a camel for a married woman: Beauty in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the security she feels. A dream about riding a camel indicates for a woman A married woman in a dream indicates that this woman will face problems and get rid of disputes. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnant camel. Seeing camels in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease of childbirth and getting rid of the effort she feels throughout the pregnancy. A camel in a dream indicates a cleaner child. Seeing a pregnant woman riding A camel in a dream indicates the approaching date of birth. Dreaming of a camel in a dream indicates the good health that she and the fetus are experiencing. Interpretation of a man seeing a camel: Seeing a group of camels or camels in a dream indicates unpleasant things, as well as hearing their sound as evidence of that. As for seeing milk Camels in a dream are a sign of many good things that the dreamer will receive. Seeing the skin of a camel in a dream is a sign of money or children. A camel indicates that whoever dreams is a sick person who bears responsibility and bears the qualities of a camel. Interpretation of dreams for slaughtering a camel: Seeing a camel slaughtered in a dream Evidence of the disease to which the dreamer is exposed. Slaughtering a camel in a dream is an indication and a message from God Almighty to the pioneer to draw the attention of enemies. Interpretation of a dream about a black camel: A black camel in a dream shows the power of insight. Seeing a black camel in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain great status and a high position in the field His work. Interpretation of a dream about a sick camel: Seeing a sick camel in a dream means that he will recover soon. As for seeing a sick camel for a person who is not sick in a dream, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about spells and banquets in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing spells and banquets in a dream is one of the visions that many people promise, and this is what we will try during this article to identify some of the interpretations of these visions by some interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin for men, women and girls. You may also recognize a lion in a dream, with the need to emphasize that it is These interpretations cannot be adopted, they are only for reading and in general to learn about the interpretation of a dream about banquets and spells, but dropping any interpretation in any vision that there is a similarity to the reader’s vision, this is completely wrong, because the interpretation of the vision depends on many checks that do not depend only on the details that The person saw it, but there are some other elements that the interpreter should know. Seeing determination in a dream symbolizes the occurrence of happy occasions that bring goodness and pleasure. Inviting someone to a party. It indicates that the dreamer enters into a partnership with this person that will bring him sustenance. Seeing determination in a dream and not eating from it symbolizes To attack people by hitting or with insulting words. Inviting someone to eat your favorite food in a dream indicates that you have achieved your goal of knowing this person. You may also be interested in: A piano in a dream. Interpretation of seeing spells and banquets in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that eating food in general in a dream is evidence of goodness and grace. Which the dreamer will enjoy. Ibn Sirin also believes that a person who eats food in a dream and feels happy indicates that he will be able to achieve aspirations and dreams. Seeing a banquet or a wedding banquet in a dream indicates the goodness and happiness that the dreamer will achieve. Also, to see banquets and spells in a dream with King or president, it means promotion at work. Then eating fruit during spells can be good news, but at a certain time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing spells and banquets in a dream. Seeing spells and banquets in a single woman’s dream. Seeing spells and celebrations in an unmarried woman’s dream is a harbinger of the marriage of that woman. The future girl, and God knows best. Just like an unmarried girl who sees a party with university friends or friends at school, this is good for her success and success, God willing. Seeing a single girl dining in a dream with someone she loves, this may be an indication that she will marry this person soon. In general, Banquets and spells in an unmarried woman’s dream are a harbinger of abundant wealth and kindness that the girl will receive. Likewise, when a married woman dreams that she intends to feed her husband, this is considered a sign for humanity of an imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. Just as a married woman eats food at a feast with a famous person, this may be good news of wealth and abundance of goodness, and God knows best. I know. title: Learn about the interpretation of divorce in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about parents’ divorce

preview.html: Divorce in a dream Many people search for the interpretation of divorce in a dream and the connotations it can bring to the viewer, whether positive or negative, depending on the viewer’s situation in reality and the details of the dream he sees. Divorce in a dream The interpretation of divorce in a dream is largely related to the reality in which the person lives according to For the opinions of leading scholars of interpretation. A dream about separation means that there are problems between spouses and major disagreements that have not yet been understood, and it symbolizes the loss of money and work after major financial problems and crises that may lead the owner to bankruptcy, and divorce also expresses loss. The viewer suffers it, whether through the loss of a loved one or the loss of something tangible. Divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin confirms that divorce in a dream indicates loss and disagreements in reality, especially between spouses and in the context of family life. A man divorcing his wife once in a dream indicates an ongoing quarrel between them, and the three-shot incident means that life between them is difficult to the point of being impossible, which may lead to separation. It also indicates the loss of an important opportunity or a prestigious job. While a dream of divorce for a bachelor or unmarried portends the end of the single life and the beginning of A new stage of emotional and family stability, and the formation of a new life with the right partner, are indications that the dreamer is getting rid of him. A certain way of life to start a new page in a different way that makes him more productive and influential, even though in reality he commits sins, and the dream expresses his desire to repent and surrender soon. Which has a website Interpretation of Dreams Online From Google, there are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see Divorce in a dream for a single woman. Seeing divorce in a dream for a single woman indicates family problems and crises in her life that prevent her from continuing the path of study or work with focus and diligence, while triple divorce indicates the end of sorrows and problems. From her life to enjoy peace and the ability to excel and prove herself, and the father throwing her daughter in a dream symbolizes the approaching marriage of her becoming responsible for her husband. Divorce in an unmarried woman’s dream also symbolizes the ongoing dispute with her fiancé and the lack of access to a space of dialogue and understanding, which may lead to The complete annulment of the engagement, and if they are not engaged in reality, means that there is a competition with a friend who has not yet reconciled, and sometimes this dream is a reflection of what is happening in the subconscious. He has negative thoughts about marriage and the spread of divorce and his fear of taking this step. Divorce in a dream for a married woman when she sees For a married woman in a dream that her husband has divorced her, this means that her life will change for the better with the end of a difficult period and difficult circumstances that made life connected. It is an indication of his profit, the abundance of money and the doors of livelihood that open before them. If she sees that she divorced her husband and married another man she knows, then she should be optimistic about the change in her life for the better and pregnancy soon, so that this will be a source of doubled love and joy. On the other hand, it may

title: Interpretation of a lion in a dream

preview.html: In this article, learn about the interpretation of a lion in a dream and its meaning in detail. The lion is considered one of the fiercest animals on earth. It feeds mainly on meat and its ferocity can even devour humans. In fact, it causes panic, fear, and panic in fear of the evil that could happen. On the other hand, seeing it in a dream is a frightening dream that causes anxiety to the same dreamer and indicates something dangerous to his life, but this dream has many different interpretations, the most important of which you can determine through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a lion in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer sees that a lion is standing in front of him in a dream, this vision indicates that he will be exposed to a big problem in reality. Dreaming that you are eating lion meat in a dream indicates victory over enemies. If the dreamer sees that he is eating The head of a lion, then this dream indicates that he will get a lot of money. If a man sees a lion without the lion seeing him, this vision indicates escaping dangers in reality. Seeing marriage to a female lion in a dream indicates the collapse of problems and difficulties. If he sees The dreamer in a dream is riding a lion and is afraid of it. This vision indicates the emergence of many problems in reality, and God knows best. If you see a lion attacking the dreamer and he is unable to kill him, this is one of the hated dreams that indicate illness, and God knows best. Seeing yourself riding a lion means a journey. There is no going back, and this vision may indicate that you will face a problem, and it may also indicate salvation from an unjust enemy. Seeing a female lion in a dream indicates the presence of an immoral woman in the dreamer’s life in reality. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a single woman. As for a single woman, the lion symbolizes the unjust enemy in her life. Seeing a lion without being afraid of it in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will soon marry a man with good morals. As for an unmarried woman who sees that a lion is attacking her and is unable to resist him, this vision is hatred and shows her bad psychological state in reality. In case she sees For an unmarried woman to eat the meat of a lion, this vision indicates the fulfillment of desires in reality. Seeing a lion in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the collapse of problems if she does not attack her. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream for a married woman: In the case of a married woman, the lion in a dream symbolizes The presence of an evil person who envies her for what she has. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is killing a lion, this vision indicates an abundance of food and an abundance of money. If a married woman sees that she is fighting a lion and defeating it, this vision indicates that she will obtain money in reality. Seeing a lion in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a lion in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will face problems in childbirth, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees that she is caring for a group of lions, this vision shows how much she cares about the health of her fetus in reality. Seeing a lion in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman indicates that she has given birth to a boy, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees a lion in her dream without being harmed, then this vision is an indication of

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see chicks in a dream. Seeing chicks in a dream indicates joy, happiness, and hearing good news. Chicks are considered one of the most beautiful decorative birds and are distinguished by the beauty of their colors and small size, which makes them popular with everyone, especially children, and there are many women. In the Egyptian countryside, raising chicks in a dream. Suppose you are in a state of wakefulness or a sign of something, then we offer you the interpretation of a dream to see chicks in a dream for an old man. Researchers in the interpretation of dreams and everything related to this vision, chicks in a dream witness a lot of goodness about the vision, happiness, pleasure, wealth and fulfillment of desires. Interpretation of a dream about chicks by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin talked about the interpretation of a dream about chicks because it symbolizes joy, happiness and comfort. Chicks in a dream also symbolize To health and money. If a person sees himself screaming in his dream, the dream indicates that he will become the owner of a large project without effort or fatigue. A chick in a dream indicates a good reputation for the dreamer and people’s love for him. Ibn Sirin spoke about the interpretation of a dream about chickens because it symbolizes joy, happiness, and comfort. It symbolizes Chicks in a dream also indicate health and money. If a person sees chicks in his dream, the dream indicates that he will become the owner of a large company without any effort or fatigue. Perhaps a chick in a dream indicates a good reputation for the dreamer and people’s love for him. For a person who saw a chick in his dream and was suffering from some disease, His dream is good news for a quick recovery from his illness. As for those who suffered from heartache and distress and saw chicks in their dreams, this is good news for ending tension and rest after fatigue. As for the one who alternates between himself and the one who saw the chicks in his dream, his dream indicates reconciliation and stopping quarrels. He sees in his dream that he is feeding chicks, then his dream indicates that he is living a cohesive and happy family life. Whoever dreams that he is playing with chicks, the dream indicates that he will give birth to a child and spend his time playing and enjoying it. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is giving birth to a chick, his dream indicates That something that the dreamer is waiting for will come true. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a married woman: If a married woman sees chicks in her dreams, this symbolizes a happy family life. But if a married woman sees in her dream that a chick emerges from the egg, then her dream is considered good news for a new pregnancy. Interpretation A dream about chicks for a pregnant woman: Whoever sees a chick in his dream, the chick symbolizes a healthy child. But if a pregnant woman sees in her dream a chick emerging from the egg, then her dream promises good news for an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a single woman: The dream interpretation indicates seeing chicks in a woman’s dream One in general indicates success and good luck. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a chick emerging from an egg, then her dream indicates that she will leave her father’s house for her husband’s house. Interpretation of a dream about chicks for a man: Seeing a chick hatching from an egg in a dream indicates that his wife will become pregnant soon, the matter Who will give birth to many healthy children. As for seeing a certain number of chicks, it is evidence that he will earn a living and comfort.
